content: Defeating this foe will earn you the Red-Haired Yaksha Spirit, and Zhu Bajie will ask that you go rest at a nearby raised pavilion in a large open area nearby.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating this foe will earn you the Red-Haired Yaksha Spirit, and Zhu Bajie will ask that you go rest at a nearby raised pavilion in a large open area nearby.
